translations: 魔术师；爱幻想的人；幻觉论者；幻觉派的艺术家

sentences.sentence: The illusionist has come to the remote town, at the invitation of an enthusiastic admirer who was a Scot with a flirtatious kilt.
sentences.translation: 魔术师应一位热情的崇拜者的邀请来到这个偏远的小镇，崇拜者是个苏格兰人，穿着卖弄风情的女式格呢褶裙。

sentences.sentence: He's obviously an illusionist at some level.
sentences.translation: 他在某一程度上不得不说是魔术师。

sentences.sentence: I have time to see the "the Illusionist" again tonight.
sentences.translation: 晚上，我才有时间又看了一遍《魔术师》。
